description:
This course is all about preforming in a high production environment where the one man crew team has to shoot hours of video every week, edit them, and export them.

The course is made of 18 different videos and more then 3 hours of training.

The videos format is a kind of over the shoulder format were I take you along with me and show you all the how to’s, tips and tricks that every editor needs to know to be able to produce a weekly video or show.

Everything I cover in the course is the direct result of experience and making mistakes.

This course is going to show you everything you need to know to be able to produce a high quality, audience engaging video that you can then use on your website or any social network to help you drive clients without working too hard.

If you want to learn to produce great videos – this course is for you.
title: Make Professional Looking Marketing Videos
